= !TankSoar Simple Sound Agent =
This agent extends the capabilities of the !TankSoar simple agent (described [Agent_TankSoar_Simple here]) with the ability to remember hearing where another tank is.  The agent can then continue to try to chase the other tank even if it can no longer sense it.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Hierarchical task composition
  * Creating persistent working memory structures to remember past state
